column3: Anthony James (Tony) Bourke (born 30 July 1941) is an Australian politician. He was a Liberal Party of Australia member of the Queensland Legislative Assembly from 1976 to 1980
column4: representing the electorate of Lockyer. A long-term Toowoomba councillor
column5: he later served as Mayor of Toowoomba from 1997 to 2000.
